This loop is the only loop on this face. Extrude this sketch by 0.0937 units in the positive Z direction. The resulting prism has the following dimensions: * Length: 0.75 units * Width: 0.75 units * Height: 0.0938 units Part 2: Cylindrical object with a tapered top and bottom Create a new coordinate system with euler angles of 0.0, 0.0, 0.0 and a translation vector of 0.2812, 0.2812, 0.0937. Create a face on the XY plane using the following circle: * Circle 1: Center at 0.0937, 0.0937; Radius of 0.0937 This face consists of 1 circle, forming a closed loop. This loop is the only loop on this face. Extrude this sketch by 0.4687 units in the positive Z direction. The resulting cylindrical object has the following dimensions: * Length: 0.1875 units * Width: 0.1875 units * Height: 0.4688 units The cylinder is located at an angle, with the top of the prism facing upwards. The top of the prism is flat and the bottom is slightly tapered. The cylindrical hole is slightly larger than the width of the prism.</description>
